attributes.action: Create a new and true People's DEMOCRACY - Smash the power of the political parties once and for all.
attributes.additional_details:
The British have no written constitution, proper 'bill of rights' or access to a "Supreme Coirt of Law" whereby the People who elect their government, may test question or challenge parliament from within law.
ABOLISH THE WHIPS
The Offices Practices and Procedures of the 'political party' WHIPS in Parliament,, 'prejudices' the People. Their activities in Parliament over-rule and supplant the constituents right to influence their Member of Parliament; replacing that rightful 'influence' with the diktat of the political parties.
